name: RentHome.ru
overview:
RentHome is a leading player in Russia’s online travel segment. RentHome creates a new to the market travelling experience for customers and partners by offering short-term rental facilities in Russia and abroad. Founded in 2011, RentHome has already established a very strong database and has access to more than 10 000 home listings in Russia and CIS and more than 2,000 home listings in selected destinations in Europe, Asia and the Caribbean. RentHome offers its homeowners a state of the art, fast, flexible and cost-effective solution that significantly improves online search for accommodations by making selection process very easy and straight-forward. RentHome is a game-changer for Russian travelers who are often limited with their travelling options because lack of hotels, value for money deals and inconvenient destinations.

RentHome was launched by one of the biggest Russia’s internet group and internet industry investor - Fastlane Ventures.

In mid 2012 the company managed to raise $1m in an angel round, led by Fastlane Ventures and different angel investors from the USA and Russia.

For more information, please visit www.renthome.ru
